characters: A child on the right side of the image, a woman with a child on the left side of the image, a man on the left side of the image, and a pedestrian on the right side of the image.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, darting into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a woman with a child suddenly appears from the left side of the image, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a man suddenly emerges from the left side of the image, darting into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the fourth sequence, a pedestrian suddenly appears from the right side of the image, entering the driving lane from behind a physical obstruction.
actions: The child, woman with child, man, and pedestrian all suddenly emerge from behind parked vehicles or physical obstructions, creating immediate collision risks.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the image, physical obstructions such as buildings and roadside structures.
